chart_description: This chart displays the rate of IPv6 Multicast Listener Discovery version 2 (MLDv2) report messages received and sent by the device.

dimension_descriptions.InMLDv2Reports: The rate of incoming IPv6 MLDv2 report messages received by the device.
dimension_descriptions.OutMLDv2Reports: The rate of outgoing IPv6 MLDv2 report messages sent by the device.
